location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Partial letter to William Newnham, Chief Secretary, Government of Bombay, from an unknown sender at the Residency

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, presumably sent by Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, forwarding a despatch received from Henry Willock, the Charg√© D'Affairs at the Court of Tehran. The letter also makes mention of financial matters, however, the letter is truncated, probably as a result of the weeding and refiling that took place in 1955, to reduce three volumes to the present volume.
